Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.

programme.title: KLU
programme.desc: Maria, pelajar universiti di luar negara pulang ke tanahair kerana ayahnya yang sakit menyambung semula pelajarannya secara tempatan. Ayah Maria, Datuk Nordin yang sakit telah pun sembuh dan merupakan seorang yang sangat kaya. Mengetahui tentang itu, Tuan Hudson yang semakin muflis mengatur langkah untuk memastikan anaknya, Bob mendekatkan dirinya dengan Maria demi harta.

programme.title: Bisikan Remaja
programme.desc: Ameera yang baru berpindah dari Sabah ke Kuala Lumpur bersekolah di kolej swasta, dan dipilih sebagai ketua kelas. Rakan-rakan Daniel bagaimanapun merasakan bahawa Daniel, sebagai ahli sukan kolej, lebih layak untuk jawatan itu. Ketidakpuasan hati ini memecahkan kelas kepada dua puak. Ameera semakin popular kerana kecantikan, kecerdasan dan personalitinya. Daniel membuat taruhan dengan rakan-rakannya, bahawa dia akan dapat memenangi hati Ameera dalam masa dua minggu. Apabila Ameera mengetahui tentang pertaruhan itu, dia dan Daniel menjadi musuh, walaupun telah membina perasaan bersama antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Ali Setan 2
programme.desc: Ikatan yang ingin tercipta terpaksa dileraikan kerana campur tangan keluarga menyebabkan Ali dan Asmidar pergi membawa haluan sendiri. Rancangan untuk mendirikan rumahtangga telah diganggu oleh Jeff yang inginkan Asmidar. Ayah Asmidar pula menyuruhnya berkahwin bersama Jeff - namun setelah beberapa bulan mereka pun bercerai kerana tidak bahagia. Ali dan Asmidar pun bersatu semula.

programme.title: Amelia
programme.desc: Amelia menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Fandy setelah mereka bertemu secara tidak sengaja di Cameron Highlands. Dalam masa yang sama ibu Amelia ingin menjodohkannya dengan Jefri. Amelia enggan menurut kehendak ibunya kerana Jefri seorang kaki perempuan. Bapa Amelia juga menentang keputusan itu dan bertemu Fandy untuk menceritakan segala yang berlaku. Fandy berasa bersalah kerana menganggap dirinya punca keluarga Amelia berantakan. Fandy mengambil keputusan untuk membawa diri ke luar negara dan hal ini telah menyebabkan Amelia terpaksa mengahwini Jefri. Selepas berkahwin, Amelia dijangkiti HIV daripada suaminya. Apabila Fandy mengetahui keadaan sebenar, dia ingin menebus segala kesalahannya terhadap Amelia.

programme.title: Hanny
programme.desc: Cinta Hanny dan Jeff dihalang oleh ayahnya, Dato’ Mansor. Hanny pulang ke kampung bapanya dan ditunangkan dengan Faizal. Jeff memberontak dan hidup sendiri dengan mengambil upah membawa teksi setelah keluar daripada rumahnya apabila Dato’ Mansor ingin menjodohkannya dengan Maria.Sofea yang juga kakak kepada Jeff telah mengupah seorang wanita bernama Sheila untuk mengintip perhubungan Jeff dan Hanny dan merosakkan hubungan mereka. Apakah kesudahan hubungan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Antara Gadis
programme.desc: Zarul, seorang yang sangat bekerja keras sanggup berniaga ketika sedang belajar kerana ingin menampung pengajiannya. Bapa kepada kekasihnya, Dato' Majid turut membantu perniagaannya. Kekasihnya, Nora yang menuntut di luar negara pulang selepas tamat pengajian namun menemui Zarul yang menghadapi kesukaran dalam pembelajaran dan percintaan.

programme.title: Rozana Cinta 87
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur menjadi saksi cinta antara Rozana, anak orang berpengaruh dengan seorang pelukis di Pasar Seni yang bernama Din. Rozana mengikuti kelas tarian dan bertemu dengan Nomi. Tanpa disedari, Nomi turut menaruh perasaan terhadap Rozana.

programme.title: Sate
programme.desc: Milah ialah seorang peniaga sate dan kedai satenya terletak di hadapan bengkel kepunyaan Kadir yang suka melakukan eksperimen aneh. Kadir ingin menyertai Anugerah Saintis untuk memenangi hadiah utama dan sekaligus menyenangkan hidup Milah. Pelbagai rintangan terpaksa dia lalui untuk mencipta mesin miliknya dan akhirnya Kadir berjaya menyiapkan mesin tersebut dan menyertai pertandingan itu.

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana baru pulang dari Amerika dengan membawa ijazah dalam bidang muzik. Dia mengikut kawannya Linda untuk bercuti di Terengganu. Di Terengganu, Suzana berkenalan dengan Hassan – seorang pemuda yang suka menghabiskan masa dengan memerhatikan orang di jeti sambil bermain gitar. Suzana akhirnya membantu Hassan sehingga menjadi seorang penyanyi yang berjaya dan telah jatuh cinta dengan Hassan. Namun Suzana telah dikejutkan dengan perubahan sikap Hassan secara tiba-tiba.

programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Sundel Bolong
programme.desc: Sundel bolong mengisahkan tentang hantu pelacuran Jawa dari mitologi Indonesia yang mempunyai semangat pendendam, yang bangun untuk membalas dendam kepada musuhnya.

programme.title: Kuba Guling Karipap Pusing
programme.desc: pertelingkahan antara dua orang wanita akibat salah faham . Seorang wanita yang berniaga kuih di sebuah gerai membantu seorang wanita lain dengan mengambilnya sebagi pembantu dan akhirnya membantunya memulakan perniagaan bersamanya. Salah faham mula berlaku apabila kuih yang diperkenalkan mula mendapat perhatian ramai dan wanita yang dibantunya berkawan dengan lelaki yang selama ini menjadi pujaannya.

programme.title: It Takes A Man And Women
programme.desc: Jalan cerita tentang seorang gadis miskin yang bekerja dengan seorang lelaki kaya di sebuah syarikat penerbitan majalah. Dia bercinta dengan lelaki tersebut namun lelaki itu telah berlaku curang kerana mementingkan diri. Gadis tersebut pergi membawa diri ke Amerika Syarikat untuk bekerja dan setelah beberapa tahun dia menjadi seorang perunding penerbitan yang berjaya dan professional. Suatu hari, syarikat lelaki tersebut mengalami masalah dan memerlukan seorang perunding penerbitan. Lembaga pengarah telah menghantar gadis itu untuk menjadi perunding bagi menyelamatkan syarikat tersebut.

programme.title: Durian Oh Durian
programme.desc: Midie seorang posmen, sangat obses untuk melihat pokok durian yang ditanam oleh arwah datuknya sempena kelahirannya berbuah. Tahun demi tahun menanti pokok itu berbuah. Berbagai usaha telah dilakukannya. Walaupun sudah 29 tahun usia pokok itu, namun tidak pernah menunjukkan tanda-tanda akan berbuah, malah pokok tersebut tidak pernah berbunga.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S13 Ep3

programme.title: Hampir Kena Ulti Ayang
programme.desc: Yuda tidak percaya gadis comel, Gita yang pernah diejeknya, telah bertukar menjadi seorang gadis yang cantik. Sekarang pun Yuda tergila-gilakan Gita. Tetapi malangnya, dia terpaksa bersaing dengan kawan baiknya sendiri.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep90
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep21
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep44
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep46
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep57
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Oppa KW Berdamage Maximum
programme.desc: Bunga sangat teruja kerana idola Koreanya akan mengadakan pertemuan peminat di tempat kerja rakannya, tetapi dia tidak tahu berita gembira itu adalah petanda buruk buat dirinya.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep23
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep21
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep29
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Oppa KW Berdamage Maximum

programme.desc: Memandangkan ibu bapa Hana meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan, dia terpaksa tinggal bersama datuknya. Datuknya akan melakukan apa sahaja untuk menggembirakan Hana. Walau bagaimanapun, Hana tidak pernah menghargai usaha datuknya, dan dia meninggalkannya kerana dia miskin.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep62
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep31
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Marrying The Mafia 2: Enemy In Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: Gang
programme.desc: Choi Ji-hoon pledges to be the ‘top gangster’ at Daehun High School by joining their underground fight club and fighting his way to the top – no matter the cost.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Finding Mr. Destiny
programme.desc: Ji-woo is still hung up on a man she fell in love in her early twenties. Her worried father has no choice but to drag her to Gi-joon, who helps people to locate their long-lost first loves.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: Marrying The Mafia 2: Enemy In Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Inside Men
programme.desc: A former political henchman seeks revenge for being dropped by a ruthless politician while a determined investigator tries to find proof of a connection between the two of them.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Big Bang
programme.desc: After Park Man-su's wife asks for a divorce, the conservative salesman decides that he'll no longer play by the rules. Though a series of mishaps, Man-su becomes an unwitting fugitive from justice.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Sisters
programme.desc: After spending time in a mental institution, two sisters return home to reunited with their family and inexplicable events start to occur…

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn’t last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Poong, the Joseon Psychiatrist 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Poong, a genius physician, got swept up in a conspiracy and was expelled from the palace. Due to trauma, he could no longer practice acupuncture but was reborn as a true doctor who heals people's hearts.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3358

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45484549
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep943944
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1785
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Like That Also Can (M) Ep11
programme.desc:
We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!
“Jiangplay” is an all new social media and reality show that our hosts experience, take on challenges by gathering trendie, old school, hippie and sub-cultures, creating unexpected fun and an all new impression on learning, giving you resonating inspiration and rush in each episode.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppy’s owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Everyone wants to win the annual Lion Dance Trophy, including Wong Fei Hung. His jealous rivals, led by Master Shen, try to frame Wong by placing a decomposed corpse in his Po Chi Lam clinic. This gives Lu Wei, a corrupted cop, the chance to pile Wong Fei Hung with various criminal charges. Will Wong be able to defeat his enemies once again?

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend’s grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms” Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World’s intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan (Chang Chan-peng) is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai (Alexander Fu Sheng). The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific (Nat Chen Pai-chiang). Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou (Wang Yu).

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The "Venoms" were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one "venom" and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu school's students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke), Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the director's best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, "bloody good" entertainment!

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Tales of a Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Iru Mugan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Vikram, Nayanthara, Nithya Menon, Thambi Ramaiah & Others

programme.desc: 'Tamil Science fiction Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, Santhanam, Anagha L.K., Shirin Kanchwala, Yogi Babu

programme.title: Dhiya
programme.desc: When Thulasi gets pregnant before marriage, she is forced to abort the baby. Years later, her unborn baby's spirit kills all those who forced her mother to undergo an abortion.

programme.desc: Tamil Political Thriller Film, Starring, Vijay Devarakonda, Mehrene Kaur Pirzada, Yashika Aannand, Nassar, Sanchana Natarajan & Others

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep28
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep20
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep21
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep7
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep22
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep25

programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Cookbook of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics – not least, bribing a TV chef to “steal” her heart through cooking.

programme.title: #Instalie
programme.desc: Laras is an influencer and Haikal, her faithful boyfriend cum photographer. Together, they’ve amassed a strong legion of adoring fans. However, their picture-perfect relationship is unexpectedly shattered when Haikal meets a mysterious lady at a party.

programme.title: I'm Losing It
programme.desc: When her fitness-obsessed boyfriend dumps her for a skinny girl, shy and chubby Anna resolves to slim down and win him back. But, with help from her plump health-nut buddy Nick, Anna discovers that true happiness is more than six-pack abs.

programme.title: In Love With My Boss
programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Death In The Forest
programme.desc: A teacher and his class come across a body in the forest with artifacts from the local museum, killed in a medieval ritual which involves being tied up and hunted in a forest. Detectives Zeiler and Oberländer are called to investigate the brutal murder.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: A Summer In Istria
programme.desc: Soccer Scout Anne heads to Istria, Croatia to be the maid of honor at her friend’s wedding. There, a talented 12-year-old player catches her attention, but she has no idea that his father was no other than her childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Cookbook of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics – not least, bribing a TV chef to “steal” her heart through cooking.

programme.title: Risks And Side Effects
programme.desc: When Pilates trainer Kathrin needs a new kidney, her husband’s hesitation to be her donor results in a crisis in their marriage. Faced with issues of life and death, the fragility of the couple’s relationship is laid bare.

programme.title: #Instalie

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A teenager’s web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It

programme.title: A Summer In Antwerp
programme.desc: Fashion designer Cara and her grandmother are reuniting with her childhood friend Judith who was forced to flee from Nazi Germany. But when they arrive at Antwerp to see her, it is not Judith who answers the door, but a young man named Mathis.

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagros’s happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wife’s growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.

programme.title: Kitwana
programme.desc: As a foreigner living in Malaysia, Kitwana is torn between settling down in Malaysia or his home country. Between his mother and his fiancé, he has to make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.desc: Mexico - This challenge sees Robson head to Mexico for a competitive 'fish off' against locals.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ultimate Predators - In the final episode, Steve looks back at his top Deadly Predators from the series and meets the ultimate predator. He reviews the biggest and best stunts from the series and reveals how the team bought a giant air vortex cannon to the Deadly junkyard to demonstrate the predatory prowess of the sperm whale.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wicked Weapons - When it comes to weapons, snakes have some of the best on earth. Steve goes in search of the adder, and sets out to blow our minds by showing us the fastest snake on earth: the diamond rattlesnake.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland - The Volcanic Highlands - The central highlands of Iceland are otherworldly. Situated at an altitude of approx. 450 meters above sea level, the region experiences some of the most inhospitable weather on the planet.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep1
programme.desc: Food Factory serves up chocolate pizza, crispy jalapeno poppers, a thirst-quenching pilsner, and a sweet chipotle chili.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Food Factory goes trick-or-treating for candy corn, booger lollipops, spooktacular gummies, and hand-frosted jack'o'lantern cookies.

programme.title: Serengeti S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Kinship - The drama now centres around the river where enchanting new characters, such as an adorable baby hippo, meet old favourites. Bonds of kinship are tested as adventures continue.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Art Of Tea - Tea ceremonies of the past inform present day rituals - including a breath-taking outdoor tea ceremony for 100 people on the banks of a river in Taiwan. The skills and passion of the world famous Rock Tea producers are celebrated in a blind-tasting competition.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep7
programme.desc: In Singapore, The Pinnacle at Duxton is a stunning seven tower, 50 story, apartment complex. And in Brighton the i360 forced engineers to think outside the box.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Canada - It's deep into the Canadian wilderness for this week's challenge: searching for the White Sturgeon, the biggest freshwater fish in North America.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - The Predator's Plight Ep1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it’s warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Meadow of Horror Ep2
programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it – you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow – but full of monsters.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - Africa's Big Cats Ep1
programme.desc: South Africa’s Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africa’s big cats.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3

programme.desc: South Africa’s Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africa’s big cats.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Peccary Party Ep3
programme.desc: In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, there’s a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. These large pig-like mammals grow up to forty five kilos and have stripes of white hair underneath their chin which gives them their distinctive appearance and name.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 4 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - The Big 5 Ep2
programme.desc: From their time as dangerous adversaries to colonialist hunters, who coined the term “the big five,” to the ever-present and considerable challenges of daily life, for the lion, African elephant, leopard, buffalo, and rhino, life isn’t easy when you’re big in the wild.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Jaguar Den Ep4
programme.desc: In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Lethal By Design Ep2
programme.desc: Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While it’s true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - De Hoop: Place of Hope Ep5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Kogelberg Ep6
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape’s protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape’s protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - Dung Beetles: Nature's Recycler Ep3
programme.desc: There are more species of beetle in the world than any other animal, and few play a role as important as the humble dung beetle. These tiny counterparts to Africa’s giant plant eaters bring balance to a system that supports life like no other.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Cat Country Ep5
programme.desc: In many countries the vulnerable and elusive ocelot is on the Endangered Species List. But on the southern edge of the Pantanal, one of the world’s largest tropical wetlands, this magnificent wild cat seems to be making a comeback. A team of young wildlife scientists is trying to understand why.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - De Hoop: Place of Hope Ep5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - The Garden Route Ep1
programme.desc: In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Kruger's Pafuri Ep2
programme.desc: In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing – water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. It’s a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - Dung Beetles: Nature's Recycler Ep3
programme.desc: There are more species of beetle in the world than any other animal, and few play a role as important as the humble dung beetle. These tiny counterparts to Africa’s giant plant eaters bring balance to a system that supports life like no other.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - De Hoop: Place of Hope Ep5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Kogelberg Ep6
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape’s protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Lanesborough, London - In the final episode of the series Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London, the first time the hotel has allowed cameras to film behind the scenes. Set discreetly in a historic building on London's Hyde Park Corner, suites are often rented for months at a time and every room comes with 24-hour dedicated butler ​service. ​Despite its extreme luxury, Giles and Monica discover a friendly staff that make staying at The Lanesborough feel like being home from home for their wealthy and famous guests.

programme.title: Top Secret Swimming Holes S2 Ep6

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Returning To Roots In Sicily - A Californian with Italian roots fulfills a lifelong dream by moving to Sicily.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Oldworld Charm In Nice - After apartment hopping in Paris, a woman decides to relocate to the Mediterranean gem of Nice, France.

programme.title: American Monster S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Craigslist Killer - Family and faith have always been important to Richard Beasley, as these home videos show. Which is why it's so scary when one day - the Ohio man vanishes.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Poltergeist Maine Mutant And The Mysterious Death - Don Wildman investigates the greatest unsolved murder in American history, reveals a crucial piece of evidence in the hunt for Bigfoot .

programme.title: Portals To Hell S3 Ep9

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S2 Ep12
programme.desc: At Home On The Italian Riviera - A woman who always dreamed of living abroad moves to Italy after discovering she can apply for dual citizenship.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S2 Ep13

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first “shadowing”/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the “nitting” club

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky And The Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep31
programme.desc: A Stu Is Born / Ruffspringa - Richie assembles a team to turn Stu into a social media celebrity. Richie's sheltered dog, Dollar, is adorable -- but he doesn't get out much.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep31
programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep5
programme.desc: The Missing Piece / The Scotchman - Archibald goes on a scavenger hunt for a missing puzzle piece. Archibald marches to a creepy house to deliver a package.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep31
programme.desc: Toddle-Lu, Mexico City - Odlulu wants her own quinceañera, a traditional Mexican celebration for a girl's 15th birthday, so she uses the Grow-Up Key to skip ahead a few years. But the key backfires and turns her into a toddler! Fritz must babysit Toddler Odlulu as she wanders through Mexico City, all while Wally and Wenda try to retrieve the Grow-Up Key and get Odlulu back to her normal age

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin’s “jokes.” Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his “comedian’s disease.” Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Monstrous Mayhem Of The Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep31
programme.desc: Swords Man - Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep5
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Five - When Fearless Leader brainwashes Bullwinkle, Rocky must team up with Director Peachfuzz to stop them from making the stinky pie and taking over the world

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep31
programme.desc: Buffalord Soldier - Astrid comes down with the Odin's Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.desc: The Journey - A paladinis trapped in a distant Galra outpost
